summary: Added a lot of stuff to the player house (Hjerim) in Windhelm.
descriptionHtml:
[color=9AC216] [size=12] [u] [b]Decided to take the mod down since I got no endorses or feedback or anything.  Keeping my mods to myself.[/b] [/u] [/size] [/color]














[color=9AC216] [size=4] [u] [b]About the mod[/b] [/u] [/size] [/color]

This is a simple mod that adds all crafting components to the Hjerim player house in Windhelm in the basement and a chest to store your crafting goodies. View read me for additional added items to the house.  Mod works well with \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7654]Realistic Lighting With Customization[/url]\" mod by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3105456]Plutoman101[/url].


[color=9AC216] [size=4] [u] [b]Before Installation[/b] [/u] [/size] [/color]

Please exit the house before installing this mod and gather all your belongings that you have added to any of the player mannequins, weapons display cases, weapons display racks, house chests, Wardrobe or dressers. And please make a backup of your char as well before installation.


[color=9AC216] [size=4] [u] [b]Installation[/b] [/u] [/size] [/color]

Unzip the file into your skyrim data folder
\"\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\"


[color=9AC216] [size=4] [u] [b]How to get the extras[/b] [/u] [/size] [/color]

When you purchase the house you will need to buy the alchemy set to get the rest of the crafting tools.  To get the third level floor you need to buy the weapons & display decorations set.


[color=9AC216] [size=4] [u] [b]Things I\'d like to do in future upgrades[/b] [/u] [/size] [/color]
[list]
[*]Maybe add more things.
[*]Add a female housecarl version.
[*]Add separate buys for each crafting tool. - Need help with, please message me if anyone is interested.
[/list]


[color=9AC216] [size=4] [u] [b]Known Bugs & Glitches[/b] [/u] [/size] [/color]

Relocated weapons display case doesn\'t seem to be working properly.  Please message me if anyone that knows how to fix this and wants to help.

Torch doesn\'t work well in the house because of the revamping of the lights in the house, but you shouldn\'t need to use a torch in the house as there are many new lights in the areas that they are really needed at.
author: Bojacks
